title: Futbol Americas: Summer Transfer Window Recap
description:
On Thursday’s episode of Futbol Americas, Sebastian Salazar and Herculez Gomez react to the Leagues Cup Showcase. Is the sellout crowd at SoFi Stadium something, nothing or everything? Next, who has had the best summer transfer window, USMNT or Mexico National Team players? Then Super League president Amanda Vandervort joins the show to discuss the inaugural USL W League season and the upcoming USL Super League. Next, VfB Stuttgart head coach has a one-on-one sit down Sebi to preview the Bundesliga season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
